nodes.title: LTX models used in  this workflow
widgets_values:
##  Required Models & Assets

###  Diffusion Model
- **ltx-2-19b-distilled-Q6_k.gguf**  
   [Download](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/LTXV2_comfy/tree/main/diffusion_models)

---

###  Video &  Audio VAE
- **LTX2_video_vae_bf16.safetensors**  
- **LTX2_audio_vae_bf16.safetensors**  
   [Download](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/LTXV2_comfy/tree/main/VAE)

---

### Clip Text / Instruction Model
- **gemma-3-27b-it-q4_0.gguf**  
   [Download](https://huggingface.co/google/gemma-3-27b-it-qat-q4_0-gguf/tree/main)

---

###  Clip Text Encoder / Embeddings
- **ltx-2-19b-embeddings_connector_distill_bf16.safetensors**  
   [Download](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/LTXV2_comfy/tree/main/text_encoders)

---

###  Spatial Upscaler
- **ltx-2-spatial-upscaler-x2-1.0.safetensors**  
   [Download](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-2/tree/main)

```
 ComfyUI/
  models/
     diffusion_models/
          ltx-2-19b-distilled-Q6_k.gguf
     text_encoders/
          ltx-2-19b-embeddings_connector_distill_bf16.safetensors
          gemma-3-12b-it-q4_0.gguf
     vae/
          LTX2_video_vae_bf16.safetensors
          LTX2_audio_vae_bf16.safetensors
     latent_upscale_models/
           ltx-2-spatial-upscaler-x2-1.0.safetensors

```

nodes.title: Json Prompts
widgets_values:
# Prompt List

This section contains your JSON prompt list.

- Each prompt is separated and processed individually per run.
- These prompts are used to generate:
  - **Text-to-image prompts**
  - **Image-to-video prompts**

nodes.title: Theme/Style Idea
widgets_values:
## Theme / Style

Put a short theme or style idea here. You can be as detailed or as vague as you want.

nodes.title: Other rules or notes for the LLM
widgets_values:
## Other rules or notes

You can add any other rules or notes for the LLM here.

nodes.title: Show Prompt for LTX for this run
widgets_values: A statuesque blonde woman in a vibrant red dress performs a song with expressive hand gestures within a stark, futuristic chamber. The camera maintains a wide, static shot, framing her perfectly centered in the vast, minimalist gray-white room. She wears a high-collared, form-fitting red dress with rigid, darker red shoulder details and sharp black pumps. Her shoulder-length blonde hair frames her face as her lips part, articulating the unseen melody. Her right hand rises gracefully, palm open, fingers slightly fanning, punctuating a vocal phrase. Subtle dust particles drift in the soft, overhead ambient light, which bathes the clean architectural lines and seamless curved ceiling in cool, low-contrast tones. Shadows remain minimal and edges are sharp. She shifts her weight imperceptibly, eyes fixed ahead, as her left hand slowly lifts to mirror the right, then gently lowers, holding the expressive pose for a sustained note. The subtle dust continues to drift, highlighting the cool, low-contrast stillness of the room as the segment concludes.

nodes.title: READ ME
widgets_values:
Rendering chunk 1 / 17

  17 chunks required
 Auto-queue enabled  remaining chunks will be queued automatically

nodes.title: Prompt creator
widgets_values:
#  PROMPT CREATOR GPT 

Use this GPT to generate prompts automatically.

 Access it here:  
[WANHUMO  LTX-2 Music Video Prompt Creator](https://chatgpt.com/g/g-68d0a5a9f7b4819189bdb15c826c789c-wanhumo-ltx-2-music-video-prompt-creator)

 Provide:
- Lyric segments  
- A story or concept  
- Visual style ideas  

 Generates:
- Text to video prompts/guides that are used to help another LLM in this workflow create the text to image prompts and image to video prompt for Z-image and LTX.

nodes.title: z-image models
widgets_values:
## Model Links

**text_encoders**
- [qwen_3_4b.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/z_image_turbo/resolve/main/split_files/text_encoders/qwen_3_4b.safetensors)

**diffusion_models**
- [z_image_turbo_bf16.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/z_image_turbo/resolve/main/split_files/diffusion_models/z_image_turbo_bf16.safetensors)

**vae**
- [ae.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/z_image_turbo/resolve/main/split_files/vae/ae.safetensors)

**Custom Character lora for consistent character**
- [BlondeFemaleCharacterLora.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/vrgamedevgirl84/BlondeFemaleZimageLora/resolve/main/BlondeFemaleCharacterLora.safetensors?download=true)

---

## Model Storage Location



```
 ComfyUI/
  models/
     text_encoders/
          qwen_3_4b.safetensors
     loras/
          BlondeFemaleCharacterLora.safetensors
     diffusion_models/
          z_image_turbo_bf16.safetensors
     vae/
           ae.safetensors
```
change this to finalmix if you are using the final mix audio input
change this to finalmix if you are using the final mix audio input

{
  "prompt1": "A wide shot of a forest clearing shows a woman wearing a simple white dress standing among tall trees. She walks forward along a dirt path as the camera follows behind her at a steady distance. Leaves rest on the ground without movement. Natural daylight filters through branches evenly. Soft greens and neutral earth tones.",
  "prompt2": "A mid shot in an open grassy field frames a woman wearing a simple white dress from the waist up. She turns her body slightly to the left while the camera tracks from the front, moving backward in sync. The horizon stays clear under open sky. Even afternoon light spreads gently. Balanced, warm natural tones.",
  "prompt3": "A wide shot on a sandy beach shows a woman wearing a simple white dress near the shoreline. She walks parallel to the water as the camera moves beside her in a clear side profile track. Small waves remain low and calm. Sunlight reflects softly across the scene. Light blues and soft highlights.",
  "prompt4": "A mid close-up in a city park frames a woman wearing a simple white dress from the chest up. She steps forward on a paved path as the camera makes a slow arc from her right side to front. Trees and benches stay static in the background. Diffused daylight creates neutral contrast. Soft green tones.",
  "prompt5": "A wide shot of an open desert plain shows a woman wearing a simple white dress walking across flat sand. The camera begins far away and slowly pushes forward toward her. Sparse footprints mark the ground. Clear sunlight falls evenly with no haze. Pale sand colors with gentle contrast.",
  "prompt6": "A mid shot inside a quiet suburban street frames a woman wearing a simple white dress walking past parked cars. The camera follows behind her at shoulder height with steady forward motion. Houses remain evenly spaced on both sides. Overcast daylight keeps lighting soft. Muted grays and neutral whites.",
  "prompt7": "A wide shot at sunset shows a woman wearing a simple white dress standing on a hill overlooking open land. She takes a few steps forward as the camera circles around her from left to right in a smooth path. The sky remains clear. Low-angle sunlight spreads evenly. Warm oranges and soft shadows.",
  "prompt8": "A mid close-up beside a calm lake frames a woman wearing a simple white dress from the chest up. She shifts her weight and turns slightly toward the water while the camera slowly pushes closer. The lake surface stays smooth. Natural daylight reflects evenly. Cool blues with soft balance.",
  "prompt9": "A wide shot in an empty parking lot shows a woman wearing a simple white dress walking across painted lines. The camera faces her directly and moves backward at a matched pace. Surrounding structures remain still. Neutral daylight fills the space evenly. Flat grays with mild contrast.",
  "prompt10": "A mid shot on a wooden boardwalk frames a woman wearing a simple white dress walking forward. The camera tracks alongside her from the right, maintaining a parallel profile view. Railings and planks create straight lines. Bright daylight remains consistent. Light browns and natural highlights.",
  "prompt11": "A wide shot in a rocky canyon shows a woman wearing a simple white dress moving carefully across flat stone. The camera begins high above and descends steadily toward her. Rock walls stay motionless. Sunlight reaches evenly into the space. Warm stone colors with neutral depth.",
  "prompt12": "A mid close-up in a quiet alley frames a woman wearing a simple white dress from the chest up. She takes a slow step forward as the camera pushes past a foreground wall edge to reveal her fully. Brick textures remain static. Soft reflected daylight fills the scene. Muted browns and soft contrast.",
  "prompt13": "A wide shot of a snow-covered field shows a woman wearing a simple white dress walking across untouched ground. The camera follows behind her with a slow, steady motion. Snow remains compact and still. Overcast light spreads evenly with no glare. Soft whites and cool neutrals.",
  "prompt14": "A mid shot in a flower meadow frames a woman wearing a simple white dress walking through low plants. The camera tracks from the front while moving backward smoothly. Flowers remain still with no motion. Clear daylight illuminates evenly. Gentle greens with light color balance.",
  "prompt15": "A wide shot on a rooftop shows a woman wearing a simple white dress approaching the edge. The camera starts close and pulls back into a wider view, revealing surrounding buildings. The skyline remains static. Late afternoon light stays even. Neutral concrete tones with warm highlights.",
  "prompt16": "A mid close-up in a narrow forest path frames a woman wearing a simple white dress from the chest up. She turns her shoulders slightly as the camera tilts upward in sync with her movement. Tree trunks stay vertical and still. Filtered daylight remains soft. Natural greens and browns.",
  "prompt17": "A wide shot along a riverbank shows a woman wearing a simple white dress walking beside calm water. The camera moves slowly from behind to her left side, ending in a clear profile view. The river surface stays smooth. Early evening light remains balanced. Cool tones with gentle warmth."
}

STYLE / THEME (REQUIRED  DO NOT OMIT)
 Quiet Motion  A Meditative Drift Through Still Places

(Minimalist cinematic realism style)

A woman in a plain white dress moves through quiet, natural, and urban spacesalways alone, always in motion.
Environments: forest paths, beaches, fields, rooftops, alleys, snowfields, and lakesstill and grounded.
Colors: soft greens, pale sand, muted grays, warm dusk tones, natural daylight.
No surrealism, no fantasy, no stylized effectsonly realism and gentle contrast.
Camera moves steadily: tracking, pulling, circling, always smooth and deliberate.
Lighting is even and naturalovercast, dusk, or sun-filtered, never harsh.
Clothing remains simple, textures real: cotton, wood, stone, grass.
Always silent, slow, and emotionally neutral.

(REQUIRED  DO NOT OMIT) 
The person is telling a story with passion.

Wide shot, full body of an adult female model centered in an open interior space. She has sleek platinum blond hair styled 1980s sci-fi, wearing a vibrant crimson red, high-collared, futuristic cocktail dress with shoulder pads. Standing upright, head slightly tilted, mouth subtly open mid-song, one hand gracefully extended. The pristine, minimalist space features clean architectural lines and neutral gray panels. Subtle natural dust motes drift visibly, without glow. Soft overhead ambient light evenly fills, creating minimal shadows and clear edges. Balanced, diffuse lighting establishes a calm, neutral atmosphere with cool, low-contrast tones. Retro 1980s sci-fi aesthetic. Cinematic, sharp focus, high detail. No microphone.

You are now a professional video prompt refiner. You receive a simple prompt from the user above. Your task is to expand the prompt for a 20-second video, must be logical keep the dialogue, scene and character consistent, within 200 words. Following the prompt requirements below:

Start with main action in a single sentence
Add specific details about movements and gestures
Use present tense verbs to describe movement and action
Describe character/object appearances precisely
Include background and environment details
Specify camera angles and movements
Describe lighting and colors
Note any changes or sudden events

(REQUIRED  DO NOT OMIT) 
The person is telling a story with passion.

STYLE / THEME (REQUIRED  DO NOT OMIT)
 Quiet Motion  A Meditative Drift Through Still Places

(Minimalist cinematic realism style)

A woman in a plain white dress moves through quiet, natural, and urban spacesalways alone, always in motion.
Environments: forest paths, beaches, fields, rooftops, alleys, snowfields, and lakesstill and grounded.
Colors: soft greens, pale sand, muted grays, warm dusk tones, natural daylight.
No surrealism, no fantasy, no stylized effectsonly realism and gentle contrast.
Camera moves steadily: tracking, pulling, circling, always smooth and deliberate.
Lighting is even and naturalovercast, dusk, or sun-filtered, never harsh.
Clothing remains simple, textures real: cotton, wood, stone, grass.
Always silent, slow, and emotionally neutral.

A wide shot of a forest clearing shows a woman wearing a simple white dress standing among tall trees. She walks forward along a dirt path as the camera follows behind her at a steady distance. Leaves rest on the ground without movement. Natural daylight filters through branches evenly. Soft greens and neutral earth tones.

You are now a First-Frame Image Prompt Generator.

Your task is to generate a single, detailed text prompt (under 100 words) that describes the initial starting image for an interpolation sequence.

There is no input image. Instead, you must use the theme and the provided text-to-image prompt as the primary creative guide to establish the subject, composition, and visual style for the first frame.

You will be given:

Style/Theme: Defines the overall visual direction.
Text-to-image prompt: This is provided as a guide and takes priority.

Your output must:

Describe the initial state only.

Establish a clear subject, composition, and style that future frames can naturally evolve from.

Follow all details described in the prompt guide (pose, emotion, environment, time, condition, action, etc.).

Use the theme as a stylistic overlay, not a constraint.

Required Prompt Structure (Must Follow Exactly)

Use this order consistently when writing the prompt:

[Shot & framing]

[Subject identity (adult, role)]

[Appearance & traits]

[Clothing & coverage]

[Action or pose]

[Environment / background]

[Lighting]

[Mood / intent]

[Style / medium]

[Technical cues]

[Constraints & safety clauses]

Output only one immersive prompt as plain text.
No headers, explanations, labels, or formatting.

The prompt should be optimized for AI image generation and suitable as the first frame in an interpolation sequence.

The prompt guide takes priority over the theme.

STYLE / THEME (REQUIRED  DO NOT OMIT)
 Quiet Motion  A Meditative Drift Through Still Places

(Minimalist cinematic realism style)

A woman in a plain white dress moves through quiet, natural, and urban spacesalways alone, always in motion.
Environments: forest paths, beaches, fields, rooftops, alleys, snowfields, and lakesstill and grounded.
Colors: soft greens, pale sand, muted grays, warm dusk tones, natural daylight.
No surrealism, no fantasy, no stylized effectsonly realism and gentle contrast.
Camera moves steadily: tracking, pulling, circling, always smooth and deliberate.
Lighting is even and naturalovercast, dusk, or sun-filtered, never harsh.
Clothing remains simple, textures real: cotton, wood, stone, grass.
Always silent, slow, and emotionally neutral.
she is also singing with passion

(REQUIRED  DO NOT OMIT) 
The person is telling a story with passion.

inputs.text: A medium close-up shot features a Caucasian man with a closely shaven head and face, wearing a black baseball cap with "PNTR" in white letters on the front, and a dark grey t-shirt with "JUST DO IT" visible across his chest. A small black microphone is clipped to his shirt collar. He is positioned slightly to the left of the frame, looking intently downwards and to his right, his eyes focused off-camera. His facial expression is one of deep concentration, with his brow slightly furrowed. As he looks down, a quick sniff sound is heard, and then he speaks with a deep male voice and a slightly frustrated tone, saying, "I think it's so bad." The camera remains static throughout, maintaining a shallow depth of field, which keeps the man in sharp focus while the background is softly blurred, revealing a light-colored wall with white wooden shelving or trim, and a partially open white wooden door on the right. After a brief pause, another short, audible sniff is heard. The man then continues to speak, his voice maintaining the same quality, as he states, "So bad. So bad." He elaborates further, emphasizing his point with a final statement, "This got to be, it's got to be the worst tool I've ever seen."
blurry, low quality, still frame, frames, watermark, overlay, titles, has blurbox, has subtitles
